# [Epic] Content-to-Ads Loop - Organic to Paid Pipeline

## Overview
Identify high-performing organic content and convert to paid ads.

## Stories
- [ ] ORB-062: Build Boost Detector
- [ ] ORB-063: Implement organic-to-ad derivation
- [ ] ORB-064: Create feedback loop analytics

## Acceptance Criteria
- Identify top 10% performing organic posts
- One-click boost with targeting suggestions
- Convert posts to ad creatives automatically
- Measure incremental impact of boosts

## Dependencies
- Phase 3 complete

## Technical Notes
- Performance ranking algorithm for organic content
- Boost workflow with platform ad APIs
- Ad creative generation from post content
- Attribution for measuring boost effectiveness
